div.p: From Nemeion, collector of the laographia in Philadelphia. Due for Epeiph of the 2nd year of Nero Claudius Caesar Augustus Germanicus imperator, are the unpaid taxes of the first year. Herakles, son of Pouris, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Horos, son of Pnepheros, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Phasis, son of Hatres, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Phasis, a son, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Petesouchos, son of Ischeis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Sambas alias Ischeis, son of Ischeis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Phasis, son of another Phasis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Phasis, son of Phasis, the son, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Polyphantes, son of Polyphantes, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Horos, son of Apollonios, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Petermotes, son of Peseris, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Harphaesis, son of Harphaesis, 45 dracmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Pylades, son of Herakleas, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Pemsas, Haryotes, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Pankrates, son of Haryotes, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Pebos, son of Herakleas, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Herakles, son of Pebos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Herakles, son of another Pebos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi.

Kallis, son of Harphaesis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Another Kallis, son of Harpaesis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Harphaesis, son of Mysthes, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Herakles, son of Petesouchos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Teos, son of Horos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Peinaus, son of Horos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Sambas, son of Horos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Pachnoubis, son of Horos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Apynchis, son of Horos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Horos, son of Abis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Pete(mounis?), son of Akousilaos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Peteouchos, son of Petesouchos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Zoilos, son of Thyon, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Hatres, son of Kephalon, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Peeris, son of Ptollis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Petouchos, son of Panoubis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Praxias, son of Harpaesis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Herakles, son of Herakles, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Sambas, son of Aropos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Horion, son of Horion, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Satabous, son of Horion, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Ptollis, son of Dios, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Dios, son of Dios, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Pomes, son of Pomes, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi Protion, Praxion, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi
